constraints.description: Productization must transform expertise and ideas into marketable packages
Must clearly identify customer pain points or needs
Must define clear solution to the identified problem
MVP must be the lightest possible version for testing
Landing page must focus on a single product
Landing page must collect customer contact information
Every product must have a catchy and descriptive name
Every product must clearly define what customer gets
Every product must have a clear price
Avoid using 'request quote' which prevents buying
KLT model requires expertise sharing through blogs/videos
KLT model requires approachable and helpful behavior
KLT model requires presentation of references and results
Invoice exercise must be possible with clear line items
Invoice exercise must have clear pricing
E-commerce thinking should clarify the product

metadata.title: Tool: Productization Toolkit
metadata.description: Collection of best tools for transforming expertise and ideas into marketable products
